task_description: {'component_name': 'Main Container for AppVote Portal', 'description': 'Primary container for AppVote Portal implementation: Create a nice Portal which will allow the user to register and login to the App submission and voting Portal. The users can login, -> Home page contains list of all the added app links with preview cards. Add Your App page is basically a form, which enables the user to add their application name, link and preview image of the application with User Name. Once they add it will be visible in the home page. Each users can vote for 5 best apps in the list, anonymous voting, also the user who created the application will not be visible to anyone else except the admin. Admin can see a table with User logged in name, Register no., Application link, App name, Votes put together in descending order with Rank of the application visible in the table. Admin should be able to share the top 10 in the table with anyone. Front end with a very nice design of Orange, White and Brown color codes and Backend using Supabase Integration should be developed. ', 'framework': 'react', 'platform': 'web'}
